title: Spicy chickpea burgers with mango salsa
description: A simple veggie burger with a nice kick of spice. Serve with a zesty mango salsa for a snack that's full of flavour. Each serving provides 450kcal, 16g protein, 67g carbohydrate (of which 9g sugars), 11g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 7.5g fibre and 1.3g salt.
